alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Livingston; Macomb; Oakland; Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lapeer, Wayne, Oakland, Macomb, southern Livingston and Washtenaw Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Dryden to near Milford to near Stockbridge. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Almont and Dryden around 535 PM EDT. Novi and Romeo around 540 PM EDT. Chelsea, Northville, Armada and West Bloomfield around 545 PM EDT. Livonia, Dexter and Birmingham around 550 PM EDT. Southfield, New Baltimore and Royal Oak around 555 PM EDT. Ann Arbor, Saline and Detroit Zoo around 600 PM EDT. Ypsilanti, Detroit and Dearborn around 605 PM EDT. Milan, Grosse Pointe, Downtown Detroit and Belle Isle around 610 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Franklin, Keego Harbor, Melvindale, Gibraltar, Waterford, Plainfield, Hudson Mills Metropark, Shelby Township, Commerce and Ray Center. People attending theÂ North American International Auto Show should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lapeer; Livingston; Macomb; Oakland; Washtenaw; Wayne
